Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL EMPLOYEES

Title: Grants retroactive membership with tier II status in the New York state teachers' retirement system to Lori Cohen
Summary: Grants retroactive membership with Tier II status in the New York state teachers' retirement system to Lori Cohen.
ActClause: AN ACT granting retroactive membership with Tier II status in the New York state teachers' retirement system to Lori Cohen
